    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109590</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109590</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Light diffraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Beugung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diffraction légère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diffraction claro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diffrazione chiara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά διάθλαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Difracción ligera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the continuous spectrum seen after white light is made to pass through a diffraction grating.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">continuous spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diffraction grating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das ununterbrochene 
gesehene Spektrum, nachdem weißes Licht gebildet ist, um durch ein 
optisches Raster zu überschreiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le spectre continu vu 
après que la lumière blanche soit faite pour passer par un réseau 
de diffraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o spectrum contínuo 
visto depois que a luz branca é feita para passar através de um 
grating de diffraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra lo spettro continuo 
visto dopo che la luce bianca sia fatta per passare attraverso un 
reticolo di diffrazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συνεχές φάσμα που 
βλέπει αφότου γίνεται το άσπρο φως για να περάσει μέσω 
ενός κιγκλιδώματος διάθλασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el espectro continuo 
considerado después de que la luz blanca se haga para pasar a través
de una rejilla de difracción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ununterbrochenes Spektrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optisches Raster</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Beugung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weißes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">spectre continu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réseau de diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diffraction légère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière blanche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">spectrum contínuo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">grating de diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κιγκλίδωμα διάθλασης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
